text_block_list.text:
It was time for the summer training camp, when 
all horsegirls go to the academy's seaside 
lodge for a period of intense training.
Or that's the idea, anyway…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
The time has come! Time to test all these theories, these many 
hypotheses composed over many sleepless nights…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
My dear Trainer, how are you feeling? 
Did you take your temperature, what did 
you have for breakfast, how long did you sleep?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
All could have a bearing on the outcome of our experiment! We 
must take care to note down every detail before we proceed!
choice_data_list: So… were you planning on doing some training today, or…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
The theory we will be verifying pertains to running 
performance, so yes! You might say it's a SORT of 
training that we will be conducting…!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Although by "we", I of course mean "you".

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Oh, come now, relax! I'll be sure to 
stop before you lose consciousness!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
We shall begin by measuring your organs' energy 
consumption under extreme stress and cardiac 
load. Then we will proceed to a phased…

Agnes Tachyon continued to reel off her test plan. 
It seemed she had no intention of doing any kind 
of conventional training herself today.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
…and that is why, rather than being bound by convention and 
spending these precious few days aimlessly running about in the 
sand, we must open our minds!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
As long as we pursue the limits of the possible… we have not a 
moment to waste! So! Let the experimentation begin!!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
First, we will use this incline here to give your 
cardiopulmonary functions a little nudge.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
To gather the data we need, I think three laps from 
here to the beach and back should suffice.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Is the pulse oximeter securely in place? Remember, 
I need a solid reading at the end of each lap!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
And no matter how much it hurts, I need you to keep going! Data 
from your absolute physiological limit is best.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
What? All you need to do is move your arms and 
legs for me. Like a hamster in a wheel!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
That said, you are only a guinea pig. I suppose it's not 
realistic to expect a hamster's level of physical conditioning.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
But worry not! I will be close at hand. Someone has 
to stop you staggering off course after all.
It didn't look like I was going to get out of this one.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
More! More, trainer…! 
Get those knees up!! Don't let your speed drop, now!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Steady, regular breaths! If you break the 
rhythm it's only going to hurt more!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Excellent, excellent! I see you're close to your 
limit, keep it up! Just two more laps to go!!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Hmm. It seems the onset of muscle fatigue was somewhat faster 
than expected. I wouldn't call it "cramp" exactly, but I think 
just standing up is hard enough for you at the moment,

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Never mind. We shall proceed to the next test. I need you to run 
up that incline again in your current state so that I can collect 
data on your respiratory function.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
This is very important data. It could, in fact, be the very key 
we seek, that unlocks the doors of untold possibility!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
However… looking at the color of you, I'd say we are not so much 
"close" to your physiological limit as were are… over it.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Can't be helped I suppose. I must reexamine the test procedure. I 
can't get the data I need from you in this condition, so let's 
save that for another time.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
If you wish to suffer further, I won't stop you. 
But rather than collecting useless data, we should 
perhaps direct our efforts elsewhere…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
But what can we do instead…? I didn't bring 
the necessary equipment for anything else.
choice_data_list: The sea's right there. Can't we use that somehow?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
The sea, eh. I could have you swim in it, but without any of my 
equipment I'm not sure what that would accomplish.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: You're not offering to drink it or something, are you?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Icing, you say? Sunny day like this, I'd say 
the water temperature's probably around 25 celsius… 
Hardly the ideal temperature, but…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
It's not going to win you any prizes, but it is an idea, at least. 
And, admittedly, it had not occurred to me.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
We could focus our attention on muscle contraction…? 
Or better yet, the insulating effect of the warm water… hmm…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
I've got it! We will investigate the combined effect of buoyancy, 
salinity and the mechanical action of the waves on your body.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Interesting, very interesting. I gathered some fascinating data. 
Not quite enough to prove or disprove my hypothesis, but…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
But with some further work, this too might be the 
key that opens the doors of untold possibility!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Yes… yes…!! Trainer, dear, come with me! 
We must record these findings!

We went back to the lodge. While I wrote up the day's results, 
I helped Agnes Tachyon with her work until long after lights-out.
Then, the next morning…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Beautiful morning, don't you think, trainer?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Thank you again for your help yesterday. Thanks to you I was 
able to formulate a new serum based on my theory.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
On paper, at any rate. Without my equipment here, we shall have 
to wait until we return to the academy to prototype it.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Before that, though, I'd like to pick your brain a little more. 
Any insights based on our work so far?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
I want to target increased oxygen uptake efficiency 
during muscle contraction, and I'd like any opinions 
you may have on the subject.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
You have a fresh perspective. As a layperson, 
I find you sometimes pick up on things that I do not. 
You have an eye for the small details.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
And most of all, you're the only one willing to assist me in my 
experiments like this every day. You might say you're my 
"guinea-pig-slash-assistant"!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Not only are you a valuable test subject, your viewpoint is 
valuable too. Taken together, I don't think it's too much of a 
stretch to call you my "assistant".

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Both of those things are indispensable requirements for my 
research. So! Don't be shy! What do you have for me?
choice_data_list: It's just… I don't think you've ever asked for my opinion before…
It's just… I don't think you've ever asked for my opinion before…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Is that so? Well, in that sense, perhaps we really have pushed 
back the boundaries of possibility!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Rejoice, my dear! Because this could be 
the first step on a grand journey for you!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Right then! With that out of the way, we should proceed to 
today's experiment. Time, after all, is a finite resource!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
I misjudged the intensity ramp-up yesterday, but I'm sure that 
this time we will observe your body at its absolute physiological 
limit! Let us away, trainer!!

I ended up running until night fell, and became 
all too familiar with my physiological limit…
